content: try this easy to follow crochet flower coaster pattern that includes detailed step by step instructions with many photos this round crochet coaster pattern will help you make your own crochet tea coasters with confidence so don t hesitate and get started now and remember that i am happy to provide support with any of my crochet patterns if needed happy crocheting details - available only in english using us crochet terms - skill level begginer to intermediate crochet skills and knowledge - finished size 10 5cm 4 inches in diameter if using 3mm = c/2 hook and light worsted #3 = dk yarn - terminology us crochet terminology this crochet coaster pattern consists of - step by step pattern descriptions including lots of photos for guidance - information about materials and equipment needed - list of abbreviations used in the pattern materials needed - this pattern will work nicely with 100% cotton 100% acrylic or a blend of both i recommend using light worsted #3 = dk yarn i used - light worsted #3 = dk yarn - 100% cotton - 1x ball of berry yarn - rico essentials cotton dk - colour berry 15 - 50g/130m - 1x ball of cream yarn - rico essentials cotton dk - colour cream 88 - 50g/130m equipment needed - crochet hook i used 3mm = c/2 but refer to the instructions on your yarn label if using different weight of yarn - scissors - yarn needle - stitch marker you may sell the crochet items you made using this crochet coaster pattern as long as you credit me as the original designer
